磢字的基本解释

磢
chuǎng
用碎瓦、石块等冲刷（器物）：把瓶子磢一磢就干净了。
磨擦：“飞涝相磢。”
峡谷：“北折如磢曰百尺峡。”

磢字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chuǎng］
［《廣韻》初兩切，上養，初。］
亦作“漺2”。
(1)磨擦。
(2)洗涤；清除。
(3)磨炼；锻炼。

磢字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【石字部】　磢； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页835第26
【廣韻】初兩切【集韻】【正韻】楚兩切，?音搶。瓦石洗物也。【郭璞·江賦】奔溜之所磢錯。

磢字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
磢字的起名意思

暂无。

Jie
Basic explanation of words
Jie
chuǎng
Rinse with broken tiles, stones, etc. (Usage): The bottle will be cleaned as soon as it is knocked off.
Friction: "Flying and flooding phases."
Gorge: "Zhang to the north like a jie called Baichi Gorge."
Jie
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chuǎng］
["Guangyun" at the beginning of two cuts, upper raising, beginning. ]
Also known as "漺2".
(1) Friction.
(2) Washing; removing.
(3) Training; exercise.
Jie
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Set 2] [Stone Character Department] 　磢; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 835 Page 26
[Guang Yun] Two cuts in the first two days [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun] Two cuts in Chu, sound grabbing. Washing of tiles is also. [Guo Pu·Jiang Fu] The place where you run is wrong.
Jie
